1:0: Phra Mahā Chatchai Rakkhitacitto was born in Udon Thani in 1957 and ordained at Wat Jetiyabhumi in Khon Khaen in 1977.
1:1: He is an advanced level dhamma scholar.
1:2: Currently, Phra Mahā Chatchai is the assistant abbot at Wat Phleng, Soi Charansanitwong 75, Bangkok, Thailand.
1:3: He teaches mettā meditation every Sunday.
